description: I made these pancakes for breakfast one morning using the Woolworth's Macro organic spelt flour, and now they are on regular rotation in our house!
keywords: Pancake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Easy Spelt Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the spelt flour, baking powder and caster sugar in a bowl.
In a separate bowl combine the egg, milk, vanilla essence and melted butter.
Whisk the wet ingredients together with the dry ingredients to create a smooth batter.
Grease a non stick fry pan with a spray and heat over a medium flame. Ladle in amounts of the mixture onto the and cook them for a couple of minutes on each side.
Stack them on a plate and serve. For a healthy option, top with Greek yogurt, sliced bananas and a drizzle of maple syrup. For a more indulgent option, top with ice cream!
